createValenceLengths

public java.util.List<CMLLength> createValenceLengths(CMLAtomSet atomSet,
                                                      boolean calculate,
                                                      boolean add)
create all valence lengths for molecule. only include each bond once

Parameters:
atomSet -
calculate - false=> empty content; true=>calculated values as content
add - array as childElements of molecule
Returns:
array of lengths (zero length if none)

calculateGeometry

public void calculateGeometry(boolean calculate,
                              boolean add)
get all internal coordinates (including redundant ones). calculates all lengths, angles and torsions in document order.

Parameters:
calculate - add calculated values as content
add - results as childElements (if false, effectively no-op except debug)

overlapBonds

public static Transform3 overlapBonds(CMLAtom atomTool1A,
                                      CMLAtom atomTool1B,
                                      CMLAtom atomTool2A,
                                      CMLAtom atomTool2B)
                               throws CMLException
get transformation to reposition one atom pair to another. the four atomTools atomTool1A, atomTool1B, atomTool2B and atomTool2A are reoriented to form a straight line. atomTool1A and atomTool1B are atomTools in one fragment, atomTool2A and atomTool2B in another. atomTool1A and atomTool1B are often, but not necessarily bonded there is no requirement for atoms to be in same molecule it is here for convenience - might be moved later

Parameters:
atomTool1A - atom in molecule A
atomTool1B - atom bonded to 1A
atomTool2A - atom in molecule B
atomTool2B - atom bonded to 2A
Returns:
the rotational transformation
Throws:
CMLException - wrong type of atoms, etc.
